snippet: The Rangers headed to Alberta to continue their training camp, with Coach Alain Vigneault looking to become acquainted with the organization and sort out which players will make the team.
abstract: New York Rangers head to Banff, Alberta, to continue their training camp, with coach Alain Vigneault looking forward to becoming better acquainted with the organization and its players.
lead_paragraph: The Rangers headed to Alberta to continue their training camp, with Coach Alain Vigneault looking to become acquainted with the organization and sort out which players will make the team.

headline.main: Trip Provides Chance for Rangers to Settle In and Fill in the Blanks
headline.print_headline: Trip Provides Chance For Rangers to Settle In And Fill In the Blanks
